failure.message: Screenshots Match Failed for login-denied-baseline.png with a tolerance of 5%. Screenshots at: Baseline: tests/screenshots/baseline/login-denied-baseline.png Result: tests/screenshots/results/login-denied-baseline.png Diff: tests/screenshots/diffs/login-denied-baseline.png Open tests/screenshots/diffs/login-denied-baseline.png to see how the screenshot has changed. If the Result Screenshot is correct you can use it to update the Baseline Screenshot and re-run your test: cp tests/screenshots/results/login-denied-baseline.png tests/screenshots/baseline/login-denied-baseline.png in 1000 ms. - expected [0;32m"5"[0m but got: [0;31m"5.04"[0m
